Posts.Content: Sep 18, 2010 06:03PM Mcirishannie wrote:  I had to stop my HRT after my diagnosis. I was on it for about 3years follwoing my hysterectomy. and quit cold turkey per doctor. Actually the symptoms have not been bad, a few hot flashes at night but definitely manageable.  I know everyone is different but maybe you will be lucky like me. so far so good. good luck!
